content: भौत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भूतानि प्राणिनोऽधिकृत्य प्रवृत्तः, तानि देवता वा अस्य अण्] {@--1@} Relating to living beings. {@--2@} Elemental, material. {@--3@} Demoniacal. {@--4@} Mad, crazy. --तः {@--1@} A worshipper of demons and spirits. {@--2@} An attendant upon an idol (देवल). {@--3@} One of the five daily Yajñas to be performed by a householder (also called भूतयज्ञ, <ab>q. v.</ab>). --तं A collection of evil spirits. --ती Night.
